remarks: The span of a union with the zero subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 22-May-2015.)
statement:
lspun0.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspun0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lspun0.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspun0.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lspun0.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ V ) $.
lspun0 $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` ( X u. { .0. } ) ) = ( N ` X ) ) $.
